word: We have before us a great work--the closing work of giving God's last warning message to a sinful world. But what have we done to give this message? Look, I beg of you, at the many, many places that have never yet been even entered. Look at our workers treading over and over the same ground, while around them is a neglected world, lying in wickedness and corruption,--a world as yet unwarned. To me this in an awful picture. What appalling indifference we manifest to the needs of a perishing world!--Testimonies for the Church, Volume VII, page 103.
